sentence: Food and beverage staff seemed stretched at breakfast but got the job done
We arrived early and did not expect our room to be ready my wife wanted to shop we left our luggage with the concierge but by 1am I was rung and our room was ready
Room menu prices are outrageous not to mention the 8 delivery charge
Eventually I managed to get them to put me on to serious support staff and spent an hour or so on the phone with them getting to bed at midnight in consequence

the services and the way the front office staffs talk to me is so unprofessional and just blaming me for the mistakeuntil the manager on duty took over and still do not give me a good result and solutionI just give up and end up paying AUD 50 for the breakfast starwod please be more kind and have more training how to handle the guests you are in a hospitality business
Expedient checkin in 3 minutes
A couple came in with a very young toddler and the staff proceeded to seat them right next to some people at the restaurant
Travelling a lot for work I was non plus about where the team stayed focusing on our conference
I also found the other staff to be a little stand offish and unprofessional often joking with each other or talking like they would in normal conversation
An inoperable safe was reported straight away to reception
I only stayed the one night and it was perfect slept like a log service
No other hotel for us for cleanliness and excellent customer service
The service and rooms were fantastic albeit a little expensive
Overall it was a good experience with good customer service and we would stay there again
It is a credit to the hotel to have a great group of staff

We used the bar a couple of times and each time has to seek out staff to take orders again not overaly attentive and not 5 starLocation fantastic Hyde park at door step short walk to Pitt street not too far of a walk to circular quay which also gives you to opportunity to look at some of Sydney ’s beautiful architecture and tree lined streets
Waiting nearly 45 mins for staff to bring our cases to our room on arrival despite calling them twice
Service is excellent and one can tell it is not fake with pasted smiles
Nothing was a problem and all the staff were happy friendly and willing to help with anything
I have stayed at motels that gave us better service
I think they fired all their Chefs and kitchen staff and brought in army cooks or hospital cooks to provide low quality cheap unhealthy food
The physical facilities are very nice but guest services could be improved
